Nwanye nke mbụ nke Naijiria ọbughi, maa anabata echichi ahụ, bu nke nwunya  onye isi ala nke Naijiria Nwanyi mbu ugbuo bu  Aisha Buhari bu onye ji echicha malite na aro May iri abụo na iteghete nke 2015.
iwu nke Naijiria  enweghị̀ ụlọ ọrụ maka nwunye onye isi ala Otuosinadi, ego na ndi madu bu ndi ewetara nwunye onye ịsị Naijiria malite na oge nwere onye. Ana akpọ nwanyị mbụ site na aha nke idimma ya
